definition: inactivity that is passive and monotonous, comparable to the inactivity of plant life
details:
noun
- inactivity that is passive and monotonous, comparable to the inactivity of plant life
= example: inactivity that is passive and monotonous, comparable to the inactivity of plant life
- an abnormal growth or excrescence, especially a warty excrescence on the valves of the heart
- all the plant life in a particular region or period
= example: all the plant life in a particular region or period
= synonyms: flora
- the process of growth in plants
